title: Tell me about your exercise routine. How often do you work out?

korean: 주 3회 정도 가려고 노력하는데, 바쁘면 2회로 줄어.
보통 퇴근하고 7시쯤 헬스장 가서 한 시간 반 정도 운동해.
그 다음엔 웨이트 트레이닝하는데, 부위별로 나눠서 해.
월요일엔 가슴, 수요일엔 등, 금요일엔 하체 이런 식으로.
트레이너한테 PT도 몇 번 받아서 자세 교정했어.
운동 끝나고 스트레칭 꼭 하고, 단백질 쉐이크 마셔.
주말엔 친구들이랑 축구하거나 등산 가기도 해.
처음엔 힘들었는데, 이제 습관이 돼서 안 하면 찜찜해.
몸이 좋아지는 게 눈에 보여서 동기부여 돼.
english: These days, I'm working out while going to the gym.
I try to go about 3 times a week, but if I'm busy, it, like, decreases to 2 times.
Usually, after work, I go to the gym around 7 and work out for about an hour and a half.
First, I warm up on the treadmill for about 10 minutes.
Then I do weight training, dividing it by body part.
On Monday chest, Wednesday back, Friday lower body, you know, like that.
I also received PT from a trainer a few times and corrected my posture.
After exercising, I definitely stretch and drink a protein shake.
On weekends, I sometimes play soccer with friends or go hiking.
It was hard at first, but now it's a habit, so if I don't do it, well, I feel uneasy.
I can see my body getting better, so I'm motivated.
My goal is to build abs by summer.
